ing: 2 tablespoons chunky or creamy peanut butter
des: "Sandwiching a serving of fruit in the classic PB&J made with whole grain bread will make eating healthy, easy, and delicious for the whole family."
ins: Spread peanut butter on one side of a slice of bread, and sprinkle with chopped apple, raisins, and peanuts. Spread jam over the remaining slice of bread, and place on top of fruit and nuts to make a sandwich.
